name: cobo
description:
"cobo" a game about collecting coins and clearing very challenging Level , Test your Controlling Skills. Physics base game.

Made Using Godot Game Engine

Controls:

Windows/Linux:

  • For move Left - Left key / A key / Left mouse button
  • For move Right - Right key / D key / Right mouse button
  • Pause - Esc key / P key 
  • Select - Enter key
  • Back / Exit - Esc key
  • Navigation - Arrow keys 

Android:

  • For move Left - Left side of the screen or Left on screen visible button 
  • For move Right - Right side of the screen or Right on screen visible button
